block.p: 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,300-sq.-ft. condo in prewar loft building; renovated kitchen, arched windows, laundry room, 3 exposures; common charge $803; taxes $9,684; listed at $1.595 million, 8 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

2-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,433-sq.-ft. co-op in prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, high ceilings, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,529, 51% tax-deductible; listed at $579,000, 25 weeks on markets (broker: Coldwell Banker/Hunt Kennedy)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,300-sq.-ft. condo in prewar loft building; renovated kitchen, arched windows, laundry room, 3 exposures; common charge $803; taxes $9,684; listed at $1.595 million, 8 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

2-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,433-sq.-ft. co-op in prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, high ceilings, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,529, 51% tax-deductible; listed at $579,000, 25 weeks on markets (broker: Coldwell Banker/Hunt Kennedy)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,335-sq.-ft. condo in 1980's building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, parquet floors, 9-ft. ceilings, large closets, balcony; listed at $925,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 750-sq.-ft. co-op in prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, renovated kitchen with new appliances, slate floors, Hudson River view; maintenance $689, 38% tax-deductible; listed at $450,000 (multiple bids), 17 weeks on market (brokers: Halstead Property Co.)

2-family Georgian-style row house; 4 bedrooms, 2 baths, dining room, music room, 5 fireplaces in primary triplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in first-floor simplex; parking space; 17-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,400; listed at $699,000, 17 weeks on market (broker: Willie Kathryn Suggs)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,450-sq.-ft. co-op in prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, renovated kitchen and bath, study; maintenance $1,224, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $610,000, 6 weeks on market (broker: William S. Ross Real Estate)
7-bedroom, 3-bath Victorian; triple parlor, finished basement, original detail, 2-car garage, 75-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,500; listed at $565,000, 17 weeks on market (broker: Rita Knox Realty)

4-bedroom, 4-bath, 2,800-sq.-ft. triplex condo in a 32-year-old building; 24-hr. doormen, eat-in kitchen, sunken living room, fireplace, 3-car parking space, outdoor pool and exercise room in complex; common charge $1,029; taxes $5,000; listed at $690,000, 1 1/2 years on market (broker: Susan E. Goldy)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 80-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, sunroom, bay window, fireplace, finished basement, 2-car garage, 131-by-116-ft. lot; taxes $2,010; listed at $699,000, 1 week on market (broker: Vitali-Sunshine)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 46-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, renovated bath, 1-car garage, 75-by-115-ft. lot; taxes $5,842; listed at $459,000 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Country Properties)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 35-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, family room, hardwood floors, 2-car garage. 1/2-acre lot; taxes $8,067; listed at $435,000, 1 week on market (brokers: Baer & McIntosh; Coldwell Banker/Realty Stars)

5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1790 house; fireplace, whirlpool bath, finished basement, central air-conditioned, 2-car garage, 0.22-acre lot; taxes $7,285; listed at $1.289 million (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (brokers: Cleveland, Duble & Arnold; Coldwell Banker/Old Greenwich)
